text: Besaka tuhade la'i likhi'a hai (nisani hai) unham do samuham vica, jinham adara (badara de maidana) vica muthabhera ho'i. Ika garupa alaha de raha vica yudha kara riha si ate duja avagi'akari si. Iha avagi'akari khul'hi'am akham nala unham nu dugana vekhade sana. Ate alaha jisa nu cahuda hai, apani saha'ita nala sakati de dhida hai. Isa vica akham vali'am la'i bari sikhi'a hai
